Package com.viaoa.jfc.border

Custom Swing border classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CustomLineBorder Sets a border with specific line widths.
HeadingBorder Border that uses a label for heading, outlines and sets interior color to white.
ShadowBorder A custom border that has a shadow on the right and lower sides.
SubheadingBorder Border that uses a label for heading.
 

Package com.viaoa.jfc.border Description

Custom Swing border classes.
